tika.dc.description: The astonishing story of a simple chemical that made life on Earth possible and continues its work today. Tiny amounts of this miracle molecule not only make life on Earth possible, but rising atmospheric CO2 levels also spur forest and crop growth, help plants survive heat and drought, and feed the world.
